item.description: Union carbide (owned now by Dow) created a chemical disaster in the small Indian town of Bhopal 26 years ago. The death toll from the disaster was worse than Chernobyl, but Union Carbide never cleaned up. People are still seeking justice. Bhopali,the movie covers this. MIT is hosting a free screening of the documentary and the director will be present there to talk as well. http://www.aidboston.org/events/BostonBhopaliFeb2011/index.htm Trailer: http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ttD-1oT9M7M
item.why:
A beautiful and stirring documentary from director Van Max Carlson. and it's free at MIT !! and he's available to talk with the public.
Trailer: http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ttD-1oT9M7M
item.name: Bhopali the movie
